LanguageData.WNA_HeatCinnabar.label: heat cinnabar
LanguageData.WNA_HeatCinnabar.description: treat cinnabar with strong heat to make it decompose into sulphur and mercury.
LanguageData.WNA_HeatStoneBlock.label: heat stone blocks
LanguageData.WNA_HeatStoneBlock.description: treat stone with strong heat to gain resources.
LanguageData.WNA_HeatStoneChunk.label: heat stone chunk
LanguageData.WNA_HeatStoneChunk.description: treat stone with strong heat to gain resources.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeCinnabar.label: make cinnabar
LanguageData.WNA_MakeCinnabar.description: use mercury and sulphur to make cinnabar.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeMethanol.label: make methanol
LanguageData.WNA_MakeNeutroamine.label: make neutroamine
LanguageData.WNA_MakeNeutroamine.description: a method to make neutroamine from chemfuel and methanol. great for supporting a colony drug business.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeReinforcedBarrel.label: make reinforced barrel
LanguageData.WNA_MakeReinforcedBarrel.description: forge a colony produced reinforced barrel.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeSynthread.label: make synthread
LanguageData.WNA_MakeSynthread.description: a method to make synthread from chemfuel and halogen. someone may have have been missing this so much.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeUraniumBattery.label: make vitalized uranium battery
LanguageData.WNA_MakeUraniumBattery.description: make an unstable powersource out from uranium.
LanguageData.WNA_RefineCorpse.label: refine corpse
LanguageData.WNA_RefineCorpse.description: refine a corpse to extract some elements composing organic flesh.
